Developers of Frenzy 1.0

Author and lead developer

  • Sergei Mozhaisky (techniX)

  • Sergei Mozhaisky (techniX)

Writing of additional software

  • Vladimir Kurtukov (vk) - “devtree” utility, patches to “xautoconf”

  • Grayich - “gconsole” utility

Porting of software

  • Andrey Zverev (AZ)

Graphical design

  • Robin Boklund (ladyrapid) - wallpaper “Fusillade”
